title: CSV Data Frame
description:
A data frame stored in a CSV file. If the `data_frame.row_names` property is present and truthy, the first column of the CSV file contains the row names of the data frame and should be ignored when indexing entries of the `data_frames.columns` property. For complex columns, a placeholder column is created in the CSV and a pointer to the relevant resource is created in the corresponding entry of the `data_frame.columns` property. The CSV file may be compressed if the `csv_data_frame.compression` property is set to `"gzip"`.

See [here](https://ltla.github.io/comservatory) for specific details on the expected formatting of the CSV.
